verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G5610>time<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> unto <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G686><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3187>greatest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> a little <S%G3813>child<s%> unto him, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G846>them,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3362>Except<s%> ye be <S%G4762>converted,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> little <S%G3813>children,<s%> ye shall <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Whosoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> shall <S%G5013>humble<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> little <S%G3813>child,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3187>greatest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> whoso <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> little <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1209>receiveth<s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> whoso <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G4624>offend<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> little <S%G3398>ones<s%> which <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> it were <S%G4851>better<s%> for <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> a millstone <S%G3458><s%> <S%G3684><s%> were <S%G2910>hanged<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5137>neck,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that he were <S%G2670>drowned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3989>depth<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> sea. <S%G2281><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> because of <S%G4625>offenses!<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it must needs be <S%G2076><s%> <S%G318><s%> that <S%G4625>offenses<s%> <S%G2064>come;<s%> <S%G4133>but<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> to <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4625>offense<s%> cometh! <S%G2064><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4624>offend<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> cut them off, <S%G1581><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> them <S%G575>from<s%> thee: <S%G4675><s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2570>better<s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G5560>halt<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2948>maimed,<s%> rather <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> to be <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G4624>offend<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> pluck it out, <S%G1807><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> it <S%G575>from<s%> thee: <S%G4675><s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2570>better<s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> with one <S%G3442>eye,<s%> <S%G2228>rather<s%> than <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> to be <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1067>hell<s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>

Take <S%G3708>heed<s%> that ye <S%G2706>despise<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> little <S%G3398>ones;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> do always <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3956><s%> behold <S%G991><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> that which was lost. <S%G622><s%>

How <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G5213>ye?<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1096>have<s%> a <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> be gone <S%G4105>astray,<s%> doth he <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G863>leave<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> ninety and <S%G1768>nine,<s%> and <S%G4198>goeth<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> that which is gone astray? <S%G4105><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> so <S%G1096>be<s%> that he <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G281>verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>he<s%> <S%G5463>rejoiceth<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G846>that<s%> sheep, <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> ninety and <S%G1768>nine<s%> which went not astray. <S%G4105><s%> <S%G3361><s%>

Even <S%G3779>so<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> <S%G1715>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> little <S%G3398>ones<s%> should perish. <S%G622><s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> shall <S%G264>trespass<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> tell him his fault <S%G1651><s%> <S%G846><s%> between <S%G3342><s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> alone: <S%G3441><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4675>thee,<s%> thou hast <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> brother. <S%G80><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he will <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> thee, then <S%G3880>take<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2089>more,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> may be established. <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall neglect to <S%G3878>hear<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> it unto <S%G3588>the<s%> church: <S%G1577><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he neglect to <S%G3878>hear<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%> let him <S%G2077>be<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> a heathen <S%G1482>man<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a publican. <S%G5057><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G1437><s%> ye shall <S%G1210>bind<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> heaven: <S%G3772><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G1437><s%> ye shall <S%G3089>loose<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3089>loosed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> shall <S%G4856>agree<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> as <S%G4012>touching<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G4229>thing<s%> that <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> they shall <S%G154>ask,<s%> it shall be <S%G1096>done<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> gathered <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> I <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of them. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> how <S%G4212>oft<s%> shall <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> seven <S%G2034>times?<s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G2193>Until<s%> seven times: <S%G2034><s%> but, <S%G2193>Until<s%> seventy <S%G1441>times<s%> seven. <S%G2033><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> likened <S%G3666>unto<s%> a certain king, <S%G444><s%> <S%G935><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G4868>take<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> <S%G3326>of<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> servants. <S%G1401><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G756>begun<s%> to <S%G4868>reckon,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> was <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> which <S%G3781>owed<s%> him ten <S%G3463>thousand<s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> forasmuch as <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G591>pay,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be <S%G4097>sold,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G3745>he<s%> <S%G2192>had,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> payment to be made. <S%G591><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> fell <S%G4098>down,<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> have <S%G3114>patience<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G591>pay<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> all. <S%G3956><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> of <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> was moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> and <S%G630>loosed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G863>forgave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> debt. <S%G1156><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> fellow <S%G4889>servants,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3784>owed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G1540>hundred<s%> pence: <S%G1220><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he laid <S%G2902>hands<s%> on <S%G846>him,<s%> and took him by the <S%G4155>throat,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G591>Pay<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3748>that<s%> thou owest. <S%G3784><s%>

And <S%G3767><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservant<s%> fell <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Have <S%G3114>patience<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G591>pay<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> all. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> not: <S%G3756><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> he should <S%G591>pay<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> debt. <S%G3784><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservants<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> what was <S%G1096>done,<s%> they were very sorry, <S%G3076><s%> <S%G4970><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G1285>told<s%> unto <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that was done. <S%G1096><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord,<s%> after that he had <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> O thou <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> I <S%G863>forgave<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3782>debt,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> thou <S%G3870>desiredst<s%> me: <S%G3165><s%>

Shouldest <S%G1163><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4571>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> have had <S%G1653>compassion<s%> on <S%G4675>thy<s%> fellow <S%G4889>servant,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> had <S%G1653>pity<s%> on thee? <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> was <S%G3710>wroth,<s%> and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G930>tormentors,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G3739>he<s%> should <S%G591>pay<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that was <S%G3784>due<s%> unto him. <S%G846><s%>

So <S%G3779>likewise<s%> shall <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3362>if<s%> ye <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G3362>not<s%> every <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> trespasses. <S%G3900><s%>
